name: WordStuff
0:
”Alexa, open Word Stuff”
”Alexa, Launch Word Stuff”
”Alexa, ask Word Stuff to add five hundred words to my project Crown of Shadows”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word stuff
des: WordStuff is the ultimate Alexa Skill for writers of all experience. WordStuff provides a reverse dictionary, a project tracking tool so you can track your writing progress, a vocabulary learning tool to help you learn and remember new words, and a host of options for finding the right words for whatever you're working on. Tools for finding related words, rhymes, words with a certain length, words that sound like, adjectives used to describe a word, and the word of the day are included!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
